name: Unchained
title: DeFi Missed Its Biggest Onboarding Moment - Unchained w/ Jeff Dorman
text:
Synopsis
DeFi missed a critical opportunity for mainstream adoption during a market volatility event, primarily due to the lack of traditional financial assets being available on blockchain platforms.

Key Insights
- On October 6, there was significant market volatility, with futures down 7% overnight
- The Yen carry trade was experiencing a breakdown during this period
- DeFi platforms performed flawlessly during the market turbulence
- Despite DeFi's stable performance, there was no rush of new users or trading activity
- The primary barrier to DeFi adoption is the absence of traditional financial assets (stocks like Nvidia, Tesla, and commodity futures) on blockchain platforms
- Investors were unable to transfer and trade their traditional financial assets on DeFi rails during the market event
